rows.text:
It’s now time to invite the participants! You have two choices:

  • You can keep your Applet private and only invite specific participants to use it. In this case you need each users’ email. You can also assign to each invitee different roles.
  • You can generate a public link so that anybody with the link can use your Applet. You can also choose if you want your users to create an account or contribute anonymously.

Go to admin.mindlogger.org and login at your account.

On your dashboard, you can see the list of applets created. For sharing the desired applet is required send invitations.
You can manage your invitations clicking on the “View Users”.

Example:
On the Stray Dogs (Test) applet click on button.

On invitation tab you can find the following sections:

  • Pending Invitations
    List of invitations already sent to users and pending to be accepted.
  • Create Invitation
    Create a new invitation and send it to the user’s email.
  • Public Link
    Set the user contribution as public, therefore it is not required to create an invitation.

Example:
Click on the “GENERATE” button in the Public Link section.

For a public contribution, it is possible to do it anonymously or identifiable, for which it is necessary to create an account on mindlogger or not respectively.

Example:
Click on “No”.

Now is possible to share the assessment link for inviting participants to contribute. Please copy and send to participants or publishing somewhere.

Example:
Click copy icon on the right side, and paste in email to your friends.
